description:
T1 – Horse Chestnut
Approximate Dimensions: 15m in height, 10m lateral spread
Proposed Works: Crown thinning by 10% throughout. No reduction in height or lateral spread; overall dimensions to remain unchanged.

T2 – Sycamore
Approximate Dimensions: 20m in height, 10m lateral spread
Proposed Works: Crown reduction to previous pruning points as part of ongoing pollard management. Reduce height by 3.5m and lateral spread by 3.5m to leave final dimensions of approximately 16.5m in height and 6.5m lateral spread.

T3 – Mimosa
Approximate Dimensions: 12m in height, 9m lateral spread
Proposed Works: Reduce height by 2.5m and lateral spread by 1m to manage form and reduce overhang into neighbouring property. Final dimensions to be approximately 9.5m in height and 8m lateral spread.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
